mapper.sql: ID, SUPPLIER_ID, QUALIFICATION_CERT, CERT_VALID_PERIOD, QUALITY_INSPECTION_DEP, CONTACT_NAME, CONTACT_TEL, CERT_CODE, USCC, CREATER_ID, IS_DELETED, PRODUCT_ID, REMARK, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_AT,SMALL_POINTS_ID
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT T1.SMALL_POINTS_ID SMALL_POINTS_ID,T2.NN NN FROM T_BSS_OB_PRODUCT T1 LEFT JOIN (select SMALL_POINTS_ID,count(ID) NN from T_BSS_OB_SUPPLIER WHERE IS_DELETED = 0 GROUP BY SMALL_POINTS_ID ) T2 ON T1.SMALL_POINTS_ID = T2.SMALL_POINTS_ID

SELECT
FROM T_BSS_OB_SUPPLIER WHERE IS_DELETED = 0
and PRODUCT_ID = #{productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND SUPPLIER_ID IN (SELECT ID FROM T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER WHERE SUPPLIER_NAME LIKE '%${supplierName}%')
AND SMALL_POINTS_ID IN (SELECT ID FROM T_SES_BMS_CATEGORY WHERE NAME LIKE '%${smallPointsName}%')
AND SMALL_POINTS_ID = #{smallPointsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
ORDER BY CERT_VALID_PERIOD

SELECT
FROM T_BSS_OB_SUPPLIER WHERE CERT_VALID_PERIOD < SYSDATE AND IS_DELETED = 0
AND PRODUCT_ID = #{productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND SUPPLIER_ID IN (SELECT ID FROM T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER WHERE SUPPLIER_NAME LIKE '%${supplierName}%')
AND SMALL_POINTS_ID IN (SELECT ID FROM T_SES_BMS_CATEGORY WHERE NAME LIKE '%${categoryName}%')
AND SMALL_POINTS_ID = #{smallPointsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
ORDER BY CERT_VALID_PERIOD

SELECT count(DISTINCT s.SUPPLIER_ID) FROM T_BSS_OB_SUPPLIER s LEFT JOIN T_BSS_OB_PRODUCT p on s.SMALL_POINTS_ID=p.SMALL_POINTS_ID and p.SMALL_POINTS_ID is not null WHERE s.CERT_VALID_PERIOD > SYSDATE AND s.IS_DELETED = 0 AND p.ID =#{productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT DISTINCT s.supplier_id,s.SMALL_POINTS_ID as smallPointsId FROM T_BSS_OB_SUPPLIER s LEFT JOIN T_BSS_OB_PRODUCT p on s.SMALL_POINTS_ID=p.SMALL_POINTS_ID WHERE s.IS_DELETED = 0 AND p.ID IN
#{item}

SELECT DISTINCT s.ID, s.SUPPLIER_ID,s.PRODUCT_ID,s.CERT_VALID_PERIOD,s.SMALL_POINTS_ID FROM T_BSS_OB_SUPPLIER s,T_BSS_OB_PRODUCT p WHERE s.IS_DELETED = 0 and p.IS_DELETED = 0 and s.SMALL_POINTS_ID=p.SMALL_POINTS_ID and p.SMALL_POINTS_ID is not null
AND s.CERT_VALID_PERIOD > SYSDATE
AND s.CERT_VALID_PERIOD < SYSDATE
AND s.SUPPLIER_ID IN (SELECT ID FROM T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER WHERE SUPPLIER_NAME LIKE '%'||#{name}||'%')
AND s.SUPPLIER_ID IN
#{item}
AND p.ID IN(SELECT DISTINCT PRODUCT_ID FROM T_BSS_OB_PRODUCT_INFO WHERE PROJECT_ID= #{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

SELECT
FROM T_BSS_OB_SUPPLIER WHERE CERT_VALID_PERIOD > SYSDATE AND IS_DELETED = 0
AND PRODUCT_ID = #{productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND SUPPLIER_ID IN (SELECT ID FROM T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER WHERE SUPPLIER_NAME LIKE '%${supplierName}%')
AND SMALL_POINTS_ID IN (SELECT ID FROM T_SES_BMS_CATEGORY WHERE NAME LIKE '%${categoryName}%')
AND SMALL_POINTS_ID = #{smallPointsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
ORDER BY CERT_VALID_PERIOD

select
distinct
from T_BSS_OB_SUPPLIER
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into T_BSS_OB_SUPPLIER (ID, SUPPLIER_ID, QUALIFICATION_CERT, CERT_VALID_PERIOD, QUALITY_INSPECTION_DEP, CONTACT_NAME, CONTACT_TEL, CERT_CODE, USCC, CREATER_ID, IS_DELETED, PRODUCT_ID, REMARK, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_AT) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{supplierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qualificationCert,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{certValidPeriod,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{qualityInspectionDep,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contactName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contactTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{certCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uscc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isDeleted,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into T_BSS_OB_SUPPLIER
ID,
SUPPLIER_ID,
QUALIFICATION_CERT,
CERT_VALID_PERIOD,
QUALITY_INSPECTION_DEP,
CONTACT_NAME,
CONTACT_TEL,
CERT_CODE,
USCC,
CREATER_ID,
IS_DELETED,
PRODUCT_ID,
REMARK,
CREATED_AT,
UPDATED_AT,
SMALL_POINTS_ID,
#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{supplierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{qualificationCert,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{certValidPeriod,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{qualityInspectionDep,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{contactName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{contactTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{certCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{uscc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{isDeleted,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{smallPointsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.select: select count(*) from T_BSS_OB_SUPPLIER where id=#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update T_BSS_OB_SUPPLIER
ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUPPLIER_ID = #{record.supplierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
QUALIFICATION_CERT = #{record.qualificationCert,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CERT_VALID_PERIOD = #{record.certValidPeriod,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
QUALITY_INSPECTION_DEP = #{record.qualityInspectionDep,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONTACT_NAME = #{record.contactName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONTACT_TEL = #{record.contactTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CERT_CODE = #{record.certCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USCC = #{record.uscc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATER_ID = #{record.createrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_DELETED = #{record.isDeleted,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PRODUCT_ID = #{record.productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMARK = #{record.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATED_AT = #{record.createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATED_AT = #{record.updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

update T_BSS_OB_SUPPLIER set ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUPPLIER_ID = #{record.supplierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QUALIFICATION_CERT = #{record.qualificationCert,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CERT_VALID_PERIOD = #{record.certValidPeriod,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, QUALITY_INSPECTION_DEP = #{record.qualityInspectionDep,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTACT_NAME = #{record.contactName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTACT_TEL = #{record.contactTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CERT_CODE = #{record.certCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USCC = #{record.uscc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATER_ID = #{record.createrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_DELETED = #{record.isDeleted,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PRODUCT_ID = #{record.productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARK = #{record.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATED_AT = #{record.createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATED_AT = #{record.updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}

update T_BSS_OB_SUPPLIER
SUPPLIER_ID = #{supplierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
QUALIFICATION_CERT = #{qualificationCert,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CERT_VALID_PERIOD = #{certValidPeriod,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
QUALITY_INSPECTION_DEP = #{qualityInspectionDep,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONTACT_NAME = #{contactName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONTACT_TEL = #{contactTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CERT_CODE = #{certCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USCC = #{uscc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATER_ID = #{createrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_DELETED = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PRODUCT_ID = #{productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATED_AT = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATED_AT = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SMALL_POINTS_ID = #{smallPointsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update T_BSS_OB_SUPPLIER set SUPPLIER_ID = #{supplierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QUALIFICATION_CERT = #{qualificationCert,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CERT_VALID_PERIOD = #{certValidPeriod,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, QUALITY_INSPECTION_DEP = #{qualityInspectionDep,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTACT_NAME = #{contactName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTACT_TEL = #{contactTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CERT_CODE = #{certCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USCC = #{uscc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATER_ID = #{createrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_DELETED = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PRODUCT_ID = #{productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATED_AT = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATED_AT = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM T_SES_BMS_ATTACHMENT WHERE BUSINESS_ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND IS_DELETED = 0

SELECT COUNT(ID) FROM T_BSS_OB_SUPPLIER WHERE CERT_CODE = #{certCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND ID <> #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
